Jurgen Klopp on #lfc's schedule: "The club organised a meeting [with a PL chief] 2 weeks ago. He told me we CANNOT change it. It's not about #LFC, Manchester United and Manchester City. We played vs Everton at 12.30, some of my players were in Peru on the Wednesday." #awlfc [lfc]

Klopp: "Teams playing on Wednesday should not be in contention for the 12.30pm kick-off on a Saturday. Sky, BT - we need to talk. If we continue like this, if the Euros happen, let's see who is part of that. We have to start thinking."

Klopp: "We have to talk again about the 5 substitutions. Maybe if 14 teams say no and 6 say yes then let us make 5 substitutions when we play each other. We want to play football - Wednesday night and 12.30pm on a Saturday should not be allowed."

Klopp very critical of PL CEO Richard Masters: "It's a lack of leadership. Richard Masters sold it completely wrong. It's not an advantage (to be able to use 5 subs), it's a necessity. In all other countries it happens. It’s really incredible."  #LFC
